Method Detail

createPresencePattern

public static PresencePattern createPresencePattern(int[] hand)
creates a presence pattern for tiles in a hand. a presence pattern has marks for every set in the hand a tile can be part of, so 3,3,3 has a mark for a pung, 2 pairs (3,3 and 3,3), and 3 singles (3, 3 and 3).

Returns:
the PresencePattern representation of the hand tiles

generateEmptyGeneric

public static int[] generateEmptyGeneric()
generates an empty genericbins structure

Returns:
an empty int[] of the correct size

generateEmptySpecific

public static int[][] generateEmptySpecific()
generates an empty specificbins structure

Returns:
an empty int[][] of the correct size
